text:
n.     -  Stem cell transplant using blood stem cells from the patient or a donor.
																                
																                
																                    Childhood Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia
																                    Treatment for childhood chronic myelogenous leukemia may include the following:         -  Targeted therapy with a tyrosine kinase inhibitor (imatinib).    - A clinical trial of targeted therapy with other tyrosine kinase inhibitors.
